languages.text: {n}В окружившей вас снежной дымке встают величественные тени — фигуры воинов, облаченных в несокрушимую броню, несущих эмблему с двумя черными клыками, впивающимися в желтизну Солнца. Они смотрят на вас.{/n}

{n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В окружившей вас снежной дымке встают величественные тени — фигуры воинов, облаченных в несокрушимую броню, несущих эмблему с двумя черными клыками, впивающимися в желтизну Солнца. Они смотрят на вас.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}你周围的雪雾中浮现出了充满威严的影子。那些战士们身披坚不可摧的铠甲，徽章上画着两颗黑色的獠牙刺穿了金色的太阳。所有人都在看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你周围的雪雾中浮现出了充满威严的影子。那些战士们身披坚不可摧的铠甲，徽章上画着两颗黑色的獠牙刺穿了金色的太阳。所有人都在看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたを囲む雪交じりの霧の中、堂々とした影が立ち上る。頑強なアーマーに身を包んだ戦士の人影が、2本の黒い牙が黄みを帯びた太陽を貫いたエンブレムを掲げている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたを囲む雪交じりの霧の中、堂々とした影が立ち上る。頑強なアーマーに身を包んだ戦士の人影が、2本の黒い牙が黄みを帯びた太陽を貫いたエンブレムを掲げている。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sombras majestuosas se alzan en la neblina nevada que os rodea: las figuras de guerreros ataviados con armaduras indestructibles, decoradas con el emblema de dos colmillos negros atravesando el sol amarillo. Te miran.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sombras majestuosas se alzan en la neblina nevada que os rodea: las figuras de guerreros ataviados con armaduras indestructibles, decoradas con el emblema de dos colmillos negros atravesando el sol amarillo. Te miran.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Des ombres majestueuses émergent de la brume enneigée. Les silhouettes de guerriers revêtus d'armures indestructibles, frappées de l'emblème de deux crocs noirs transperçant le soleil, vous observent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des ombres majestueuses émergent de la brume enneigée. Les silhouettes de guerriers revêtus d'armures indestructibles, frappées de l'emblème de deux crocs noirs transperçant le soleil, vous observent.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}In dem verschneiten Nebel um dich herum erheben sich majestätische Schatten – die Gestalten von Kriegern in unzerstörbaren Rüstungen mit einem Emblem aus zwei schwarzen Fangzähnen, die das Gelbe der Sonne durchstoßen. Sie blicken dich an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In dem verschneiten Nebel um dich herum erheben sich majestätische Schatten – die Gestalten von Kriegern in unzerstörbaren Rüstungen mit einem Emblem aus zwei schwarzen Fangzähnen, die das Gelbe der Sonne durchstoßen. Sie blicken dich an.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Önündeki karlı pusun içinden heybetli gölgeler yükseliyor. Savaşçılar; güneşin sarısını delip geçen iki siyah dişin amblemini taşıyan, yok edilemez bir zırh giymiş. Sana bakıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Majestic shadows rise in the snowy haze around you — the figures of warriors clad in indestructible armour, bearing an emblem of two black fangs piercing the yellow of the sun. They are looking at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki karlı pusun içinden heybetli gölgeler yükseliyor. Savaşçılar, güneşin sarısını delip geçen iki siyah dişin amblemini taşıyan, yok edilemez bir zırhla kaplanmış. Sana bakıyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
